description: Amy Lee has just joined the gym and is working out in front of Trystan Bull, who has just popped in to get in some quick lifting. Her form could best be described as 'shaky', so Trystan offers some instruction and shows her a few pointers. Their attraction is immediate, and it soon becomes obvious to Trystan that Amy has got designs to wrap her fingers around another pole entirely. title: Sexy Flex
